data.text: @GovCanHealth I tried to log in (I already have an account) but I forgot my password and your system seems to be down.  I can't seem to request a new password be sent. Very glitchy.  Please advise.
@GovCanHealth #ArriveCAN is a useless waste of tax dollars. Also end preflight and border testing.
@GovCanHealth how can you use this for a days cross border shopping trip?

@GovCanHealth Tax dollars are paying for this ridiculously pointless violation of rights. So many resources are wasted to accommodate the useless requirements for this. How can Health Canada have any scientific credibility if they still support this blatant anti-science political tool?
